name: AstroBike
description:
Prepare your mind and skills for a challenging and addictive motorbike racing game. Collect every emerald - or the one challenging diamond - in each track and then head for the black hole. Discover the fastest route through 70 epic tracks (+7 secret tracks). AstroBike is the ultimate trial of skill + strategy + speed.

Download the game today and compete for 150 Global Leaderboard records. The first 20 levels are 100% free.

Play solo, create a team or represent your country. Battle it out on the Steam leaderboards to become the next AstroBike Champion!

There are two ways to complete the huge roster of uniquely-themed tracks. The main objective is to collect the emeralds and then head to the black hole. But if you want a hardcore challenge, then see if you can collect the one diamond hidden in every track.

Once you have finished every track, the game will add up all of your fastest times. This ‘Total Time’ is the most prestigious record in AstroBike. How many hours, minutes, and seconds can you shave off yours? How high can you climb up the world rankings?
